text: Invoice exception segment defines queue ownership as Ops East with a 24h SLA and escalation at 80 percent.
Verification segment requires a test exception to confirm queue assignment, timer start, and escalation behavior.
Compliance exception closure segment includes remediation summary, evidence attachments, and owner attestation.
After completion, status changes to Review Pending and appears in weekly snapshot reports.
Weekly snapshot segment refreshes control metrics, delayed indicators, and leadership commentary.
Integration registration segment stores endpoint type, owner team, credential reference, and heartbeat test result.
Verification checks sample payload receipt and monitoring logs after activation.
Monthly audit evidence segment includes logs, report exports, manifest generation, and sign-off.
Audit manifest verification confirms checksum values and artifact links for each control.
